name: The Great Fleece (SneakyDaggerGames)
description:
A stealthy mini-RPG that has you breaking into an auction house vault. Avoid pathing guards and moving cameras to reach the vault doors and claim your prize!

I completed this project as part of a Cinematography with Unity course and created all systems for the game including cutscene cinematography, dialog and cutscene triggers, player movement, enemy AI pathing, environment textures, menus, UI, and more.  This project took 2 weeks to complete from start to finish.

Controls:

Left click to move (cameras will auto update)

Right click to toss coin (listen for audio cue)
